title: Neighbourly Behaviour
description: Melissa's life has been leading up to her securing a place at Cambridge, but under her perfect exterior lies a simmering minx. She seduces her next door neighbour, a former Oxford rowing Blue with the shoulders to prove it, and spends the night as his willing submissive. Hot May/December BDSM short, of around 7000 words.
author: Violet Veidt
